import React, { Component } from "react"; import { MDBContainer, MDBBtn, MDBModal, MDBModalBody, MDBModalHeader, MDBModalFooter, } from "mdbreact"; import { MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBInput } from "mdbreact"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { addHistoryInApi } from "../../Action/historyActions"; import { EditProductInApi } from "../../Action/ProductActions"; class ModalEditProduct extends Component { state = { id: this.props.element.id, reference: this.props.reference, name: this.props.name, type: this.props.type, collection: this.props.collection, color: this.props.color, picture: this.props.picture, quantity: this.props.quantity, box: this.props.box, location: this.props.location, mesures: this.props.mesures, product_status: this.props.produit_status, brand: this.props.brand, element: this.props.element, }; componentDidMount() { this.setState({ element: this.props.element }); } render() { return ( this.props.toggle()} fullHeight position="top" > this.props.toggle()}> Ajouter nouveaux Article
